text: John W. de Gruchy (born 18 March 1939) is a South African Christian theologian. He is known for his work resisting apartheid. He is a Emeritus Professor at the University of Cape Town and Extraordinary Professor at the University of Stellenbosch. He was born in Pretoria, South Africa. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:South African writers Category:Christian theologians Category:South African academics Category:People from Pretoria
title: John W. de Gruchy
